and these descriptions inserted into me: Site code; see site info above (character)
Plot code; see site info above (character)
Identifier of individual sensor, tree, etc. being measured (character)
Spatial location; for TEMPEST, grid square (character)
Observed value (usually numeric, except for time of min/max). The no-data value is '[NA_STRING]'
ID (MD5 hash) of the source datalogger file this value came from
Flag: out of instrumental bounds (logical, 1=TRUE; empty if no bounds for this research_name)
Flag: sensor listed as out of service (logical, 1=TRUE; empty if no out of service data for this research_name)
Flag: possible outlier based on mean absolute deviation (MAD) from time period grouping (logical, 1=TRUE)
